name: WorkspaceFolder_DeleteWorkspaceItems
description:
This method deletes one or more files or sub-folders from a workspace folder or root.

Note: To delete items from a workspace, the `status` of the workspace must be `active`.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

workspaceItemList.description: An array of objects that describe the items in a workspace.
workspaceItemList.x-ms-summary: An array of objects that describe the items in a workspace.

workspaceItem.description: This object represents an item in a workspace, which can be either a file or folder.

contentType.description: If the item is a file, this property specifies the content type of the file.

created.description: The UTC DateTime when the workspace item was created.

createdById.description: The ID of the user who created the workspace item.

extension.description: The file extension of a file item.

fileSize.description: The size of the file in bytes.

fileUri.description: The URI for retrieving the file.

id.description: A unique ID for the Salesforce object.

lastModified.description:
The UTC date and time that the comment was last updated.

**Note:** This can only be done by the creator.

lastModifiedById.description: The ID of the user who last modified the item.

name.description: The name of the file or folder.

pageCount.description: The number of pages in a file.

parentFolderId.description: The ID of the parent folder, or the special value `root` for the root folder.

parentFolderUri.description: The URI of the parent folder.

sha256.description: A 64-byte, Secure Hash Algorithm 256 (SHA256) checksum that the caller computes across the entirety of the original content of a file. DocuSign compares this value to its own computation. If the two values are not equal, the original content and received content are not the same and the upload is refused.

thumbHeight.description: The height of the thumbnail image.

thumbWidth.description: The width of the thumbnail image.

type.description: The type of the workspace item. Valid values are file, folder.

uri.description: A URI containing the user ID.

workspaceItem.x-ms-summary: This object represents an item in a workspace, which can be either a file or folder.

workspaceUserAuthorization.description: Provides properties that describe user authorization to a workspace.

canDelete.description: When **true,** the workspace user can delete items from the workspace.

canMove.description: When **true,** the workspace user can move the items in the workspace.

canTransact.description: When **true,** the workspace user can create transactions from the workspace.

canView.description: When **true,** the workspace user can view the items in the workspace.

created.description: The UTC DateTime when the workspace user authorization was created.

createdById.description: The ID of the user who created the workspace user authorization.

modified.description: The UTC DateTime when the workspace user authorization was last modified.

modifiedById.description: The ID of the user who last modified the workspace user authorization.

workspaceUserId.description: The ID of the workspace user.

workspaceUserAuthorization.x-ms-summary: Provides properties that describe user authorization to a workspace.

errorDetails.description: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

errorCode.description: The code associated with the error condition.

message.description: A brief message describing the error condition.

errorDetails.x-ms-summary: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

workspaceUser.description: This object represents the workspace user. This property is only returned in response to user specific GET call.

accountId.description: The account ID associated with the workspace user.

accountName.description: The name of the account that the workspace user belongs to.

activeSince.description: The UTC DateTime when the user joined the workspace.

created.description: The UTC DateTime when the workspace user was created.

createdById.description: The ID of the user who created this workspace user.

invitationEmailBlurb.description: The text of the workspace invitation email message sent to the user.

invitationEmailSubject.description: The subject line of the workspace invitation email message sent to the user.

lastModified.description: The UTC DateTime that the workspace user was last modified.

lastModifiedById.description: The ID of the user who last modified the workspace user.

status.description:
Filters the results by user status.
You can specify a comma-separated
list of the following statuses:

* ActivationRequired 
* ActivationSent 
* Active
* Closed 
* Disabled

type.description: Type of the user. Valid values: type_owner, type_participant.

userId.description: The ID of the workspace user.

workspaceUserBaseUrl.description: The URL for accessing the workspace user.

workspaceUserId.description: The ID of the workspace user.

workspaceUserUri.description: The URI for accessing the workspace user.

workspaceUser.x-ms-summary: This object represents the workspace user. This property is only returned in response to user specific GET call.

page.description: Description of a page of a document.

dpi.description: The number of dots per inch used for the page image.

height.description: The height of the page in pixels.

sequence.description: The sequence of the page in the document, or page number.

width.description: The width of the page in pixels.

page.x-ms-summary: Description of a page of a document.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
